name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The headquarters building of the Galley-La Company, Water 7's premier shipbuilding organization. A large multi-story structure that houses the offices of Iceburg and the foremen, serving as the center of Water 7's shipbuilding industry.

keyEvents.title: CP9's Coordinated Attack
keyEvents.description: A massive explosion signals the beginning of CP9's raid on the Galley-La headquarters to obtain the Pluton blueprints.
keyEvents.significance: The headquarters becomes the battleground for CP9's reveal and their assault on Iceburg.

keyEvents.title: Masked CP9 Agents Infiltrate
keyEvents.description: Multiple masked CP9 agents, disguised as the Straw Hat Pirates, storm the building and attack the shipwrights.
keyEvents.significance: The infiltration marks the culmination of CP9's five-year undercover operation.

keyEvents.title: Shipwrights Defeated Throughout Building
keyEvents.description: Robin and CP9 agents defeat multiple shipwrights as they move through the headquarters toward Iceburg's office.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates CP9's overwhelming power and the helplessness of the Galley-La defenders.

statusHistory.reason: Headquarters remains operational despite the attack

description: The private office of Iceburg, president of Galley-La Company and mayor of Water 7. This room becomes the scene of CP9's direct confrontation with Iceburg regarding the Pluton blueprints.

keyEvents.title: Blueno Creates Door Into Office
keyEvents.description: Blueno uses his Doa Doa no Mi powers to create a door through the wall, gaining direct access to Iceburg's office and bypassing all security.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Blueno's Devil Fruit ability and the beginning of CP9's direct confrontation with Iceburg.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Reveals Conspiracy to Iceburg
keyEvents.description: Robin and Blueno reveal to Iceburg that they framed the Straw Hats and their true objective is the Pluton blueprints.
keyEvents.significance: The office becomes the location where the conspiracy is revealed and the true stakes of the Water 7 arc are established.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg Shot in His Office
keyEvents.description: Blueno shoots Iceburg in his own office to weaken him for interrogation about the Pluton blueprints.
keyEvents.significance: The office transforms from a place of authority to a crime scene, marking Iceburg's vulnerability.

statusHistory.reason: Office debuts as the site of CP9's confrontation with Iceburg
